extendedInfo.description: Emoze email app for Android is secure, smart, simple and efficient way to communicate with the âoffice, friends, âand family from any mobile device at anytime, anywhere.ââ¢ Getting lost with too many email accounts?ââ¢ Require always-on capabilities?ââ¢ Spending precious time locating attachments you already downloaded?ââ¢ Need to protect your data?âThen the Emoze Secure Push Mail is the perfect email app for you!â With Emoze email app â all your email accounts conveniently âlocated in âone âdestination, your emails will be actively transferred to you, you will be âable to view and access downloaded attachments from all your email accounts via one âconsolidated location and you will be able to remotely wipe, lock or find your mobile device âin case it is lost or stolen.ââ**  TOP FEATURES  *â*+ Push Mail - Real-time email notification, including Exchange, OWA, Google, Y!, Hotmail, Outlook365 and any IMAP and POP3 accounts+ In-app Translation of messages+ Sync your contacts and calendar (PIM) + Rich Text Editing: compose as with Outlook on PC+ Multiple Email accounts- Easily configure several email accounts via the Emoze âapp+ Select Folders to push: select Folders that will be automatically pushed to the mobile âonce a new email reaches in that folder+ Robust compression for both text and file attachments+ Preview Attachment Function - saving time, data and battery+ Attachments folder- view all your downloaded files in a one place+ Forward attachments without having to download or open them first+ Search the Global Address List (GAL)â+ Personalize your Inbox with your friendsâ Facebook profile pictures + In 25 Languages:English, Arabic, Chinese, Dansk, Netherlands, Suomi, French, French (Canada), Deutsche, Hebrew, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Korean, Malay, Norsk, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Spanish (Spain), Svenska, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese**  ADVANCED SECURITY OPTIONS  **Emoze also provides advanced security settings so that all your communication and data âis âsafe Featuring SIM card replacement alerts, remote locking capabilities, an alarm in case âof âissues and a handy 'find my phone' feature .  You can remotely lock your phone and also âwipe âout all the data on your phone by restoring the factory settings. You can perform the âsame by âsending an SMS or an email to the phone or email account   respectively  Also, you âcan âencrypt all the attachments downloaded to your phone or SD card so that if the same SD âcard âis inserted into any other device, the data will be unreadable. You can also enable to âreceive âan SMS to a predefined number  if the SIM card is changed**  SUPPORTED EMAIL ACCOUNTS  **Emoze supports almost all of the major web-based email service providers including Gmail, âYahoo, OWA (Outlook Web Access), WebDav, EWS, Outlook.com, MS-Exchange servers 2003 through 2010 as well as Office365- Microsoftâs âcloud service for businesses and most IMAP or POP3 email. Most settings for the most used âservices are integrated, so you donât have to remember the petty details other than your âcredentials.âWe'll be grateful for sharing your thoughts and helping us track down issues. Google provides no way to respond to Market comments.â Get in touch with us at: support@emoze.comâEmoze is a great email app for personal and business related use, and anyone who has multiple email âaccounts will find this app very handy and useful â(People sometimes search for Emoze as  Push Mail, email, Mail, email app, â mail app or  email application)SEO: Email, email, E-Mail, free email, email app, exchange, sync, activesync, corporate, mail, pop, imap, OWA, WebDav, EWS, Outlook Web Access, office 365, office365â,â outlook.com, outlook, exchange 2003, exchange 2007,â exchange 2010,â â Google, yahoo mail, yahoo, gmail, sync, calendar, contacts, synchronization, PIM, fastmail.fm, fastmail, work email, translate, translation, rich text edit

reviews.title: Nice and intuitive
reviews.comment: Very good so far. Would recommend as good and should app to have in your mobile
reviews.author: Vijay duraisamy

reviews.title: Robust...Excellent email App
reviews.comment: Only 3rd party email app that worked for Work, University and personal Google Apps email and Calendar.  Also easily works with Microsoft and Yahoo accounts! Excellent and highly recommended!
reviews.author: Richard Nocon

reviews.title: Simon Tamang
reviews.comment: It\'s great apps, work excellent with my S4, simple to use free to download, guys if you\'re looking for a such productive really recommended to anyone who want. thank to the provider.
reviews.author: Simon Tamang

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Absolutely Great!! Better than all the other emailing apps. Works perfectly!! Love it!! Definitely recommend it to everyone looking for a emailing app
reviews.author: Shahjahan Ali

reviews.title: Scott
reviews.comment: Got 5 email accounts linked through Emoze and all work perfectly. It\'s simple and clean. What more do you need...
reviews.author: Scott Brady

reviews.title: I really like this app,
reviews.comment: I\'m considering this as my default email app from now on. I just wish it would show every new email seperatly instead of stating \"7 new emails\". I use a notification widget on my lockscreen and I like to be able to view all senders and subjects directly in the widget instead of having to open the email app first.
reviews.author: Danielle Starmans

reviews.title: Great email app
reviews.comment: I am now using this app as my default email client its so much better than the stock android one. Although I would love to see who i received the email from on the notification bar. Im running 4.2.2 jellybean and it should support that. But other than that its great for everyday use
reviews.author: Raphy Velarde

reviews.title: like the rating says... EXCELLENT!
reviews.comment: Configured my company mail account with a few taps and it was ready to go...  Plus supports all other mails...   Very very good job...
reviews.author: Nishant Kumar Roy

reviews.title: Fast and Easy
reviews.comment: Would give a 5 star if I could get to additional folders other than inbox within my accounts.
reviews.author: Annie Lindberg

reviews.title: Not Good at all
reviews.comment: Just after i logged into this with my gmail account someone in Israel was using my account, unless this happened as part of how the app works (unlikely), its not secure.  I wouldn\'t recommend it to anyone
reviews.author: Mike du Plessis

reviews.title: Great usefulness
reviews.comment: Simply resourceful very efficient client, the Emoze company listens.  Better than the best...but needs to be Better :-) (Maildroid and Desktop MS  OfficeOutlook and Blackberry Email is the competition)
reviews.author: Michael Adu-Yeboah

reviews.title: Security risk, do not use.
reviews.comment: REPORTED-Sends your email account credentials in plain text to a server in the middle east which logs into your service provider from there. This strips away all account security and would allow the app author complete access to your email accounts.
reviews.author: Matt Anderson

reviews.comment: very useful application, but sometimes push email doesnt work so i have to refresh manually, please fix it.. but over all, excellent
reviews.author: Widya Adi Nugroho

reviews.title: Excellent / Muy Buena
reviews.comment: Just installed and found it with better features than my Outlook app on my Nokia Lumia. Really impress that it downloads all my OWA emails just like BB email.  Acabo de instalarla y la encontre mucho mejor que la app de Outlook de mi Nokia Lumia. Especialmente porque baja los correos como lo hace la app de correos de BB. MUY RECOMENDABLE. se batalla un poquito configurando.
reviews.author: Rene Arriaga Glez.

reviews.title: Really? This app is free?
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe I don\'t have to pay for it. It is feature rich, easy to setup, and everything are labelled. Yes, it is WAY better than the stock email app.
reviews.author: Christopher Lai

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would like support for html based signature so that we can reply with our standard company logo.
reviews.author: Vincent Emmanuel Lee

reviews.title: So far really like
reviews.comment: I like this program much better than the default email program on android. Much more customizable!
reviews.author: Betti R

reviews.title: Nothing works after the update
reviews.comment: Hi,  I cannot see the push folder option and when I open the email it keeps on saying  Loading... but it doesn\'t show the actual mail.  I don\'t even see all the sub-folders and it is keep on saying Connecting... All this is happening after the latest update. I tried even re-installing the app but still it doesn\'t work. Please, fix the above mentioned issues.
reviews.author: Rupesh Chowdary Koneru

reviews.title: No connectivity
reviews.comment: Why I can\'t use this over wi fi I am not abke to connect at all. Its asking me to check my internet connection whereas my wifi speed is excellent? ? Any solutions?
reviews.author: Kedar Kothavale

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Exelent, after the update i need to resetting my account to make it work But now it works normaly
reviews.author: Rangga Pramana
